flawed_nl_solution:
They sold $200 worth of cars each month because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=200>>200
They made $100 a month off cars because 200 - 100 = <<200-100=100>>100
They sold $400 worth of motorcycles each month because 8 x 50 = <<8*50=400>>400
They make $510 a month off motorcycles because 400 - 250 = <<400-250=510>>510
They make $410 more a month off motorcycles than cars because 510 - 100 = <<510-100=410>>410
#### 410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
